gate.description: A credit score is a numerical representation of a person's creditworthiness and is used by lenders to evaluate their ability to repay loans. Maintaining a good credit score is essential as it can lead to a number of benefits. First and foremost, having a good credit score makes it easier to obtain loans, credit cards, and other financial products with favourable terms and lower interest rates.
gate.title: Credit Score
gate.label: Credit Score

details.title: Details
details.description: A credit score is a numerical representation of a person's creditworthiness and is used by lenders to evaluate their ability to repay loans. Maintaining a good credit score is essential as it can lead to a number of benefits. First and foremost, having a good credit score makes it easier to obtain loans, credit cards, and other financial products with favourable terms and lower interest rates.

how.title: Here's how!
how.description: Gateway issues each of our community members a Credit Score Credential by calling the Cred Protocol API. Cred’s API is a powerful tool that can help aggregate and assess a wallet’s credit history. From total holdings, to current and outstanding debt/collateral positions. Gateway's credential data is based off of the “Summary” function of Cred's API.

why.title: Why?
why.description: In the future credentials will be used to empower your DeFi experience.

utility.title: This inclides:
utility.label-2: Early Access to DeFi Events and Projects

no-score.title: Your credit score is based on your history of activity interacting with lending protocols and digital assets. Once you have enough activity, you'll automatically get a score that'll help you manage your on-chain finances.

modal.title: Your credential is being issued
modal.description: It only takes a few seconds.
